name: Greek BMI Calculator
author: Giannis Katsaros

sections.description: Add a body mass index calculator to your blog by using the [bmi-greek-green] or [bmi-greek-blue] shortcodes. See the screenshots for previews.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/greek-bmi-calculator directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add the shortcode [bmi-greek-green] or [bmi-greek-blue] and the tool is ready for use
sections.faq:
Which languages this plugin supports

The current language is only Greek, in the future more languages will added.

Which results this calculator shows

The plugin calculates the BMI from the given weight and height, and shows the category that the user belongs “normal, overweight etc”, but in greek.

Can I use this widget on commercial website

Yes, you can use it whatever you like, but not sell it or upload it as yours.

Are there going to be more colors?

Yes, in future updates.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This version fixes a security related bug.
  • Initial stable version

0.3

  • Added Title and css in specific results

0.2

  • CSS changes

0.1

  • Initial beta version

short_description: With this plugin you can calculate BMI and show the results and the category that the user belongs, in greek.
